Team.title: MEET THE
Team.subtitle: NAH, JUST KIDDING. ALL OF THEM IS ME!
Team.paragraph: Here let me show you the truth!

About.title: GET TO KNOW ME!
About.name: Muhammad Dimas
About.paragraph1: , a Junior Programmer and Digital Artist who`s all about design, music, and coding cool stuff. I got into programming back in 2020 when I decided to build my own public Minecraft Server, and since then, I`ve been hooked!
About.paragraph2: You`ll usually find me lost in the world of creativity, whether I`m crafting 3D wonders, designing eye-catching graphics, or vibing to my latest music creation. Programming isn`t just a hobby for me; it`s my passion.
About.paragraph3: So, Klaw, RIOT REVENGER, NEON PAPER KID, and Midnight Koala? Yup, those are basically my alter egos.

Works.title: FEATURED WORKS!
Works.cf-desc: Capres Facts is a website that showcases facts about Indonesian presidential candidates (capres) who will be running in the 2024 elections.
Works.l-desc: a JSON based API that you get to search the landscape of every famous city in Asia, want to try it? [Under Development]
Works.ai-desc: Your loyal companion during Ramadhan. Discover the imsak and prayer schedules.
Works.hsd-desc: your go-to Python-powered app! Seamlessly identify and interpret hand signs with ease. [Under Development]
Works.r-desc: Portfolio website for the one and only RIOT REVENGER.
